T02D3098:190a-0: @190a * // lha mo gdugs dkar mo can la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3098:190a-2: dang por gor gyi 'byung po la mchod pa dang gtor mas tshim par byas te /
T02D3098:190a-3: de nas bsgrub bya rnams la thams cad 'joms par
T02D3098:190a-4: byed pa'i sngags kyis bgegs bskrad cing gzir ba dang
T02D3098:190a-5: / srung ba'i 'khor lo btags te khrus bya ba dang /
T02D3098:190b-0: 'phags pa gdugs @190b dkar mo can sgom pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
T02D3098:190b-2: gor zhi ba'i gsol ba gdab pa dang /
T02D3098:190b-3: tshangs pa la sogs pa mchod pa dang gtor mas tshim par byas te gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D3098:190b-4: de yang bar skabs su gdugs dkar mo dang srung ma'i tshogs la gsol ba gdab cing /
T02D3098:190b-5: snyim pa sbyar te bsrung bar bya'o //
T02D3098:190b-6: khyad par du gor gyi 'byung po la 'byung gtor gyis mnyes par ba'o //
T02D3098:190b-7: de ltar thun bzhi'i sbyor bas rtag tu bsgoms pas mthar phyin pa dang /
T02D3098:190b-8: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa la mchod bstod byas te /
T02D3098:190b-9: phyugs de rnams gnas dben par gnas par bya'o //
T02D3098:190b-10: de lta bus ni gor thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
